intent: Create a personalized Rust learning plan for an intermediate programmer

success_criteria.primary: Plan is actionable and fits the time constraint (5 hrs/week, 2 months)
success_criteria.secondary: Resources and progression are appropriate for intermediate level

quality_rubric.feasibility: 40 hours total (5hr * 8 weeks) is realistically allocated
quality_rubric.resource_validity: Named resources actually exist and are relevant
quality_rubric.actionability: Learner knows exactly what to do each week
